ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: You are only the warner of those who fear it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Your duty is only to warn him who fears it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: You are only a warner to him who has a fear of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: You are only a warner for those who fear such a day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You are but a Herald of Warning, for one who fears it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You are only a warner for those who fear it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: You are only a warner to him who would fear it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Thou art only the warner of him who fears it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thou art but a warner unto him who feareth it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: you are but a warner for those who fear it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thou art but a warner Unto him who feareth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: You are only a warner for those who are afraid it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thou art but a Warner for such as fear it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You (O Muhammad (Peace be upon him)) are only a warner for those who fear it,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: You are but a warner for those who fear it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You are just a warner for whoever dreads it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: You are only a warner for those who fear it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [79:45] You are only a warner for, your warning will only benefit, the one who fears it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thou art but a warner) you are but a warning messenger by means of the Qur'an (unto him who feareth it) to him who fears its advent.
